column4: I am behind a dsl router, ever since I started using bittorrent my firestarter firewall keeps reporting that it blocks portrequests from various IPs on port 6881, what I don't understand is why my dsl router routs these portrequests to mx 192.168.178.24 box and not for instance my laptop! how does it know where to send it? the only explanation I have is because these were somehow connections which were established FROM my own box, but then
why does my firestarter block these connections?
Because you have them marked to be blocked on the config
